ModMetaData.name: Platonic Relationships
ModMetaData.author: lydocia
ModMetaData.description: Platonic relationships prohibit romantic relationships from naturally forming. Use Character Editor, Prepare Carefully or similar to add adoptive relationships between pawns. Included: - Best friend - Childhood friend - Classmate - Twin brother / sister - Supervisor - Subordinate - Mentor - Assistant - Chosen family - Professor - Teacher - Student - Business partner - Brother/sister-in-arms - Colleague - Coworker - Godmother/Godfather - Godson/Goddaughter - Captain - Crewmate
